title: Album Page, "Ca d'Oro, Venice", October 21, 1887
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on cream paperboard tipped into binding with fabric
markings: Verso, stamped in brown ink (inscribed in a rectangular shield): Cooper Union / Museum / New York.
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, upper right corner: (inscribed in circle) 69 / 80; below drawing: Ca' d'Oro / Venice / Oct 21st 1887.
description: Vertical sheet with a large, detailed sketch of the Ca' d'Oro as seen from the Grand Canal.  The building is designed in the Venetian Gothic style and in this drawing has visible a very colorful, polychromed exterior.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Ca d'Oro, Venice", October 21, 1887.
October 21, 1887. Brush and watercolor, graphite on cream paperboard tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-37.
